Question: Fujian Gamet Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Fujian Gamet Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlight:
- 23.6" Circle Round Display
- 55'' Splicing LCD Display
- 21.5'' Touch Monitor
- 43 inch Curved Touchscreen
- All-in-one PC 21.5''
- 86‘’ Smart Whiteboard
- 86'' Teaching Smart Blackboard
- LED Magic Cube
- Paperless conference system
- PC Classroom

Specifications:
- Specializes in R&D, manufacturing, and marketing of industrial open frame monitors, touch screen monitors, and touch panel PCs ranging from 6.5" to 98"
- Widely applied in Gaming, Banking, Healthcare, Industrial Automation, Retail, Public Information Station, Transportation, and more
- Offers professional services in customizing products and project management
- Factory located in Changting, China
- Exported to more than 20 countries globally

Contact:
Address: The 3rd Floor, 6th Building, No.1 Tengfei 6th Road, Tengfei Industrial Zone, Changting County, Longyan City, Fujian Province, China
Tel: (86)18159547680

福建佳明信息科技有限公司

产品亮点：
- 23.6英寸圆形显示屏
- 55英寸拼接液晶显示屏
- 21.5英寸触摸屏显示器
- 43英寸曲面触摸屏
- 21.5英寸一体机
- 86英寸智能白板
- 86英寸教学智能黑板
- LED魔方
- 无纸化会议系统
- PC教室

规格：
- 专注于研发、制造和销售工业开放式显示器、触摸屏显示器和触摸屏一体机，尺寸从6.5英寸到98英寸不等
- 广泛应用于游戏、银行、医疗、工业自动化、零售、公共信息站、交通等领域
- 提供定制产品和项目管理的专业服务
- 工厂位于中国长汀县
- 产品出口到全球20多个国家
